channel.title: sports on Ella Devenny's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in sports on Ella Devenny's Github Site

item.title: Sports Data Analysis and Visualization
item.description: Hey, Ella again. I am just learning the basics of creating a blog through R studio, so as part of our homework we were to create our first post. It is really exciting to see the knowledge and skills we have learned in my sports data course come to life. I am excited to share my journey on here and watch myself grow! I will be posting actual projects on here very soon.
